visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a column chart with the title 'Monthly Sales Data'. The chart should have axes and labels styled with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include two series: '2022 Sales' with data [10, 15, 20, 25, 30] and '2023 Sales' with data [12, 18, 22, 27, 32]. Use custom colors for the series and include additional configurations such as chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a column chart titled 'Monthly Sales Data'. The chart type is set to 'column', and the background color is light gray (#f9f9f9) with specific margins for top and bottom. The title is styled with a dark gray color and a font size of 24px. The x-axis categories represent months from January to May, with labels styled in a medium gray color and a font size of 14px. The y-axis title is 'Sales', also styled in medium gray with a font size of 16px, and the labels are similarly styled. The data series include '2022 Sales' and '2023 Sales', each with their respective data points and custom colors. The legend is enabled and styled with a dark gray color and a font size of 14px.
